# Initialise analysis

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library (ggfortify)
```


First we load the data, chack it and load required packages

```{r}
canary <- read_csv("Canary_island_Argyranthemum.csv")
head(canary)


```

```{r}
a <- mutate(canary, leafratio = (leaf_length/leaf_width))

```


# Cluster analysis

The clusters have different leaf/length ratios.

```{r}
ggplot(a, aes(x=as.factor(cluster), y=leafratio)) +
  geom_boxplot ()
```
